subScenes.name: 开场问候
subScenes.description: 旅客与保险代理人初步寒暄并说明来意

qaPairs.speakerText: Hi there! I'm planning a trip next week and wanted to check out travel insurance options.
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 嗨！我下周要旅行，想看看旅游保险有哪些选择。

responses.text: Sure! I'd be happy to help you find the right plan.
responses.text_cn: 当然！我很乐意帮您找到合适的计划。

responses.text: Of course! What kind of trip you got?
responses.text_cn: 当然！你是什么类型的旅行？

responses.text: Travel insurance? Yeah, I can help.
responses.text_cn: 旅游保险？行，我来帮你。

qaPairs.usageNote: 用自然口语表达需求，避免生硬提问

subScenes.name: 询问必要性
subScenes.description: 旅客询问是否必须购买保险及覆盖范围

qaPairs.speakerText: Do I really need travel insurance? I mean, it's just a short trip to Japan.
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 我真的需要买旅游保险吗？只是去日本短途旅行。

responses.text: Absolutely! Even short trips can have unexpected issues like flight delays or lost luggage.
responses.text_cn: 绝对需要！短途旅行也可能遇到航班延误或行李丢失。

responses.text: Nah, you're probably fine without it.
responses.text_cn: 不用，你大概率不用买。

responses.text: It's optional, but highly recommended.
responses.text_cn: 可选，但强烈建议买。

qaPairs.usageNote: 用具体理由说服对方，增强说服力

qaPairs.speakerText: What does the basic plan cover?

responses.text: It covers medical emergencies, trip cancellations, and lost baggage — all the big stuff.
responses.text_cn: 保医疗紧急情况、行程取消和行李丢失，都是大事。

responses.text: Basic? Just hospital visits and flight delays, I think.
responses.text_cn: 基础的？大概就医院和航班延误吧。

responses.text: Medical + cancellation. That's it.
responses.text_cn: 医疗和取消，就这些。

qaPairs.usageNote: 用简洁口语明确核心保障，避免冗长

subScenes.name: 既往病史处理
subScenes.description: 旅客说明有慢性病，咨询是否影响投保

qaPairs.speakerText: I've got high blood pressure — will that affect my coverage?
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 我有高血压，这会影响保险吗？

responses.text: It might, but we can add a pre-existing condition waiver if you're stable.
responses.text_cn: 可能影响，但如果你病情稳定，可以加免责条款。

responses.text: Oh, that’s tricky — might be denied.
responses.text_cn: 哦，这有点麻烦，可能被拒保。

responses.text: Just declare it — we’ll sort it out.
responses.text_cn: 直接告知就行，我们来处理。

qaPairs.usageNote: 主动披露病史，避免理赔纠纷

subScenes.name: 理赔流程确认
subScenes.description: 旅客询问发生意外后如何申请理赔

qaPairs.speakerText: What if I get sick abroad? How do I file a claim?
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 如果在国外生病了，怎么申请理赔？

responses.text: Call our 24/7 helpline first, keep all receipts, and we'll process it within 3 days.
responses.text_cn: 先打24小时热线，保留所有收据，3天内处理。

responses.text: Just email your bills — no big deal.
responses.text_cn: 把账单发邮件就行，不麻烦。

responses.text: You gotta call ASAP and send docs. Don't wait.
responses.text_cn: 赶紧打电话，发材料，别拖。

qaPairs.usageNote: 强调关键步骤：及时联系+保留凭证

subScenes.name: 结束咨询
subScenes.description: 旅客确认购买并礼貌道别

qaPairs.speakerText: Okay, I think I'll go with the standard plan. How do I pay?
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 好的，我选标准计划，怎么付款？

responses.text: Great choice! You can pay online now — I'll email you the confirmation.
responses.text_cn: 明智选择！现在在线支付，我发确认邮件给你。

responses.text: Cool, just click the link I sent.
responses.text_cn: 行，点我发的链接就行。

responses.text: Pay now. Done.
responses.text_cn: 现在付，搞定。

qaPairs.usageNote: 用简短确认句快速推进交易

qaPairs.speakerText: Thanks for your help — this really puts my mind at ease.
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 谢谢你的帮助，这让我安心多了。

responses.text: My pleasure! Have an amazing trip!
responses.text_cn: 不客气！祝你旅途愉快！

responses.text: No problem. Safe travels!
responses.text_cn: 没事，一路平安！

responses.text: Yep, you're good to go.
responses.text_cn: 行了，你可以出发了。

qaPairs.usageNote: 道别时表达感谢，提升沟通温度
